refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This set of commands allows to manage an abstract optimization method. The goal is to provide a building block for a large class of specialized optimization methods. This component manages the number of variables, the minimum and maximum bounds, the number of non linear inequality constraints, the logging system, various termination criteria, the cost function, etc...
The optimization problem to solve is the following
refsection.programlisting: min f(x) l_i <= x_i <= h_i, i = 1,n g_i(x) >= 0, i = 1,nbineq
